attributes.action: Make Tommy Robinson a knight of the Realm.
attributes.additional_details:
It will be harder to silence him being knighted.
Imagine that one of our own knighted.
Let's send them a real proper message.
WE CAN DO THIS
attributes.background: Let's stick to those loathsome obnoxious repellent  individuals in the house of commons.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
